description: Leyton Orient get the better of relegation-threatened Cambridge to extend their unbeaten run of league matches to six.
title: Leyton Orient 2-0 Cambridge United
title_page: Leyton Orient 2-0 Cambridge United - BBC Sport
maintext:
Leyton Orient have won each of their last two Football League games against Cambridge United and will be looking to win three in succession against this opponent for the first time since February 1986.
Cambridge United have lost just two of their last eight away Football League games against Leyton Orient (D3 L3), conceding exactly two goals in each of their last three such matches.
Each of Leyton Orient’s last two final Football League games of the year have finished goalless with the O’s not suffering three draws in successive such matches since between 1985 and 1987.
Cambridge have lost each of their last four final Football League games of the year between 2020 and 2023, scoring just one goal in total during that stint.
